701162f.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Marcy Place
701162f.text:
Grand Concourse, east side, north from (No. 1362) but not including Marcy Place, to East 171st Street. Also shown are W.P.A.
men repaving the east lane of the thoroughfare.
March 31, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
701162f.folder: Grand Concourse & Marcy Place, Bronx, NY
